trends: There has been one other sighting in Orangeville
There were no other sightings in Orangeville on or around March 7th 2003
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving from my house to sons house aproxamatly 14 mile saw strange verticalvapor trail in sky. followed it upward and it lead to a jet , jet was suroundedby 4 or 5 bright lights in straight line. stoped at sons house and got him tocome out side and observe lights. as soon as we got out side to watch thebright lights in a straight line begain to fade out not sure if they faded outand went off , it was cloudy and just before dark. or took of so fast as todisapear. jet went out of sight range seconds afterward.
